page.title: 15BRETT THOMAS - A LOCAL BOY
page.content: Brett is an{eleven year old}boy,who lives on an estate in an end of terraced house.He was born in Neath in Wales and moved to Hereford with his family. He likes egg and chips and Coke is his favourite drink.When he grows up he would like to be a footballer or to join the army.His favourite television programme is 'Minder'.Among his interests are his pets.He has a cat, a dog and many goldfish.He also has a brother called Wayne,both of them have played for the school football team. His school teacher says that he is a happy boy who has a lovely sense of humour and who works steadily without fussing. Brett is moving to his secondary school in September and is looking forward to playing rugby.
